com.basis.renders

Class BBjGridExWidgetColumn

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basis.renders.BBjGridExWidgetColumnDefinition
      • com.basis.renders.BBjGridExWidgetDefaultColumnDefinition
        • com.basis.renders.BBjGridExWidgetColumn

  • public class BBjGridExWidgetColumn
extends BBjGridExWidgetDefaultColumnDefinition
    The class holds the grid column props , it aslo introduces serveral helper methods to update the styles like , fore/back colors.
    Author:
    Hyyan Abo Fakher

      BBjString Field!

      Note: Once the field name is set , it becomes immutable
